item.title: Justin Fields won't get benched? Myles Garrett is DPOY? Let's overreact to Week 8

item.title: How the matchups line up for all 46 postseason games

item.title: Projecting the CFP top 12 after Week 9: Vandy's in the field!

item.title: Buzz: Who got the ball, who got shut out on Sunday
item.description: Knowing who got the ball and how is as important as the fantasy points that were (and weren't) put up on Sunday.
